PoP: Sands of Time Playthrough (Part 2)

Game: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
Published on Fri Sep 10 2021

Not a whole lot new to report, the game has been pretty same-y thus far. Enjoyable, but literally nothing new has happened and I'm at the 50% mark.

The combat hasn't evolved much. Some enemies naturally are immune to the whole jump attack combo, but those same enemies are usually weak to other simple attacks, so no real serious challenges yet.

I'm really curious just how much story might get crammed into the latter half, seeing how little has happened so far. Likely my next writing on the game will be of the ending. ï»¿
